resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81322</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81322</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4276</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Beat the Beat!</string>
            <string language="es">¡Dale con ritmo!</string>
            <string language="ga">Buail an Buille!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlagen Sie den Schlag!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Battez le battement !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bata a batida!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Batti il battimento!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κτυπήστε Beat!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan to encourage children to experience listening and responding to music with a strong beat.</string>
            <string language="es">Plan de lección para animar a los niños a experimentar escuchando y respondiendo a música con un ritmo fuerte.</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean ceachta a spreagann leanaí éisteacht le ceol le buille trom agus freagairt dó.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan, zum der Kinder anzuregen, Musik mit einem 
starken Schlag zu hören und zu reagieren zu erfahren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon pour encourager des enfants à éprouver 
écouter et répondre à la musique avec un battement fort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição para incentivar crianças experimentar 
escutar e responder à música com uma batida forte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione per consigliare ai bambini 
sperimentare ascoltare e rispondere alla musica con un battimento 
forte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο μαθήματος για να ενθαρρύνει τα παιδιά για να
δοκιμάσει το άκουσμα και την απάντηση στη μουσική με έναν ισχυρό
κτύπησε.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4276</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

        <educational>

          <context>

          </context>
          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
